history.content:
If you are in L&S, you can retake up to 12 units of work. I don't know what the number is for COE.

I believe you would have to get a NP in the P/NP class to retake it. But unless retaking the two classes take you over the maximum, I think you would be able to retake both classes.

That's correct, the university allows you to retake up to 12 units of coursework. You may only repeat a course if you NP or get below a C-, more about that here: http://registrar.berkeley.edu/staff_resources/academic_records_transcripts/courserep.html

So I'm taking CS70 right now and I want to pass/no pass it and retake it in Spring. I also have to retake another class because I failed it. Can I retake both for a grade or can I only retake one for a grade even though one is being retaken on a pass/no pass basis?
history.subject: Can you pass/no pass a class and retake it and will be eligible to retake another class you failed?
